text: Jeanne Mitchell OAM (11 May 1938 â€“ 7 November 2020), professionally known as Jeannie Little, was a Gold Logie-award-winning Australian television personality and singer. She was born in Sydney. Little was best known for her appearances on The Mike Walsh Show, Cuckoo in the Nest and Beauty and the Beast. Little was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2009. She died from the disease in Sydney on 7 November 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian singers
title: Jeanne Little
